name: Flappy Gobat
description:
Hi, This is the prototype of what could be my very first game. I'm still learning to code with Godot Game Engine. But I think this will be good enough to share with you guys. Especially when I'm finished with it.

My Youtube Channel

I know its a bit dark, it's by choice. I want the player to feel like 'blind as a bat' and will need Echolocation to help navigate. I'm still trying other things to see what I can code. I think it's 30% done. 

Game Features:

  • Wait for user input (Space Bar or Tap Screen) before starting the game.
  • Spawn Obstacles every 1 second at the beginning, and then decreases it over time.
  • All pixel art are mine. 
  • Music and Sound Fx are taken from opengameart.org with CC0 licenses. 

Features that I'm planning to add to the game.

  • HUD ( with Lives Counter & display High Score)
  • Make the Obstacles completely invisible. And then every time the Gobat flaps its wings, it generate a sound wave (for echolocation) that will reveal the incoming hidden obstacles.
  • Might completely redo how the obstacles respawn (maybe by groups?!).
  • Re-shape and retexture the Parallax Backgrounds.
  • Player Death Animation

=======================

Pls! share your feedbacks and High Scores here.
